div.ab: rāspīg (at the place of the srōšāwarzān): vid. VrS24.3.

Commentary.ab: VrS24.9a staōtaca] Cantera, 2021, p. 22ff. staōtaca as imperative, cf. dāraiiaδβəm, vərəziiātąmca and astū in the srōš-barišnīh; Kellens, 2010 p. 82 proposes staōtaca *yesniia in dissimilation with the following yasnāica.

Parallels.ab: ratə̄ušca aṣ̌aōnō bərəzatō ~ Y1.18 Y3.20, Y4.23, Y7.21, Y24.28, Y66.18, VrS78.30, VrS79.23, VrS81.17 raϑβō bərəzatō; ~ Y57 (passim), Y70.7, Y71.25, VrS11.3, VrS18.6, VrS30.12, VrS41.7, VrS42.11, VrS51.9, VrS57.9, VrS62.9, VrS64.10, VrS65.11, VrS65.83, VrS69.9, VrS71.9, VrS74.6, VrS75.11; VrS87.13, VrS89.22, VrS93.12 ratūm bərəzaṇtəm; ~ VrS1.16, VrS25.18, VrS27.32, VrS90.16 ratə̄uš bərəzō; ~ VrS2.18, VrS17.17, VrS77.17 ratūm bərəzəm.
jaγmūš́iiā̊ ratufritōiš ~ Y24.3 (x2), Y24.8 (x2), Y25.3 (x2), VrS87.11 (x2) jaγmūšīmca ratufritīm.
